EmailTemplate.name: 09-13-21 BNK Coin-Business Banking Email 1.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: New Ebook! Coin transactions take twice as long, automating them can free you up
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Handling coin in the branch is time consuming. In fact – a coin-based transaction can take twice as long as other teller transactions, which has led many financial institutions to limit the amount of coin per transactions. And time-consuming branch transactions are not a great customer experience right? Especially if you’re a small business owner. So combining automation and coin deposit and dispense at the ATM brings coin into the digital first world. Find out more with our latest ebook. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
